data.name: The Midnight Eater
data.detailed_description:
The Order of the Golden Veil calls Jonathan to investigate a curse that has been slaughtering a creepy forest. Jonathan is a demon hunter like nobody else and uses insanity to look inside the darkness.
Collect the cursed totems, while dealing with a hellish creature that brings death to the forest.

Features

- Found Footage atmosphere;
- Find the hidden totems while being chased by a sinister creature;
- A mix of classic "collect item" with new mechanics increasing difficulty;
- Manage your Stamina to run, control your insanity to find the totems and avoid the creature while collecting;
data.about_the_game:
The Order of the Golden Veil calls Jonathan to investigate a curse that has been slaughtering a creepy forest. Jonathan is a demon hunter like nobody else and uses insanity to look inside the darkness.
Collect the cursed totems, while dealing with a hellish creature that brings death to the forest.

- Manage your Stamina to run, control your insanity to find the totems and avoid the creature while collecting;
data.short_description: Enter the skin of Jonathan "Midnight Eater" Lewis and hunt a sinister demon in this horror game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: I3-3220 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX950 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: I3-3570 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
